body: All he had to do was say call me daddy instead of dad and the mood could have shifted. They do this on the regular and it’s making her happy.
Pg.27 would have made me soft in an instant if that happened to me irl.
iirc, she was infact assaulted by a police officer as a child. I dunno about her dad, but it doesn't seem all that unlikely.

I've been wanting to comment since this came out but couldn't. Now I can.

This is sad but also wholesome, I guess. The part about her (probs noncanon) past was really sad, wish they ended up having a conversation about that and then have a deep embrace afterwards.

Probably too much to ask, as we all know Revy is someone who tries to look cool all the time.
